title: Commercial Officer Interview
Interview Descriptions: Friendly and some easy, time to think and it was a great time.. the interview went well and it was so great and surprising. Contributing to bedc is a great avenue to develop Nigeria as a great nation

title: Engineering Graduate Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at BEDC
Interview Descriptions: Overall, the interviewers tried to calm the tension and make me feel at ease. They were not hostile or condescending.  The process was orderly and the waiting room was in good condition. They also did not try to be too controlling or police us while we waited our turn.
Interview Questions: Can you tell us about yourself?

title: Marketing Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at BEDC (Burlington, ON)
Interview Descriptions: Interview consisted of a business case and a panel interview. More personality/behavioural questions than technical with a lot of situational type questions (i.e. tell us about a time when...). The questions weren't difficult but the usual run of the mill questions that you'd get anywhere else, each panel interviewer took a turn asking. A little uncomfortable being analyzed by several people when it comes to non-technical questions but that's subjectiv.
Interview Questions: Why or why not would I use LinkedIn to advertise to their target audience.
